tasks.task: Feeding livestock with a hay wagon
subtasks: Positioning the hay wagon adjacent to the livestock enclosure
Lowering the chute mechanism of the hay wagon to release feed
Ensuring the feed is distributed evenly
Manipulating the lever or handle to lower and raise the chute
Verifying the chute is properly aligned with the livestock feed area
Observing the livestock to ensure all animals receive feed
Adjusting the chute or wagon position as necessary
